page.title: 19RESCUES
page.content: THE HARTLAND{COASTGUARD}CONTACTS THE {R.N.L.I.}INSHORE BOAT AND THE{R.A.F. CHIVENOR{HELICOPTER}AND THEY WORK AS A TEAM. ALTOGETHER THERE ARE 3 MEN WORKING ON THE INSHORE RESCUE BOAT AT ONE TIME. MIKE BOWDEN, JOHN PAVITT AND CLIFF EDWARDS ARE THE{CREW.}HERE ARE SOME RESCUES STARTING FROM{APRIL 1985 {1.}SEARCH FOR SURVIVORS FROM AIRCRAFT IN BIDEFORD BAY{:NOTHING FOUND. {2.}ONE WIND SURFER A CANOIST AND A SMALL DINGHY{:SAVED THREE. {3.}CHILD MISSING OFF INSTOW:{FOUND. {4.}FISHING VESSEL 'LA NOROISE' WITH ENGINE FAILURE:{TOWED TO APPLEDORE {5.}WIND SURFER CROW ROCK:{SAVED {6.}SEARCH FOR RIDER WHEN HIS HORSE BOLTED INTO THE SEA HE WAS LATER FOUND ASHORE{:SAVE HORSE.} {7.}TWO PERSONS PICKED OUT OF WATER OFF SHIPYARD FALLING OUT OF SMALL DINGHY.
